body: 87 that pissed me off the husband I’m sorry but fuck that guy the girl deserves to be loved by the guy who actually loved her like I hope they make sequel where he finds them and cucks the husband and takes the wife back

Why the flamin' ardvark piss are the thumbnails not loading!!!!! If I load more than 36 pages without going back to the starting page I lose my place & I can't get back to the menu page that I was on, Because I don't have sufficient ram to keep it all in memory. How the hell am I supposed to see where the chapters in a large manga begin I can't see the damn thumbnails???!!!???!!!??? WTF!!!???!!!???!!!???
